summary: Adds a unique preset for Nord males.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#f1c232]Oct 2016 update: this is working with Skyrim SE. Make sure to use v 1.8 of Face Light (see recommended mods below).[/color][/b]

This .esp adds a unique preset for Nord males. Additional mods are optional, but recommended. See below.

This is a re-upload of an image and preset file I posted a couple of years ago, seen here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/images/174991/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/images/174991/?[/url]

[b][color=#f1c232]Compatibility[/color][/b]

This may conflict with other preset mods. If you run into problems, bump this .esp to the top of your load order and temporarily disable other mods that affect the character generator / race menu.

[b][color=#f1c232]Support[/color][/b]

Outside of the above tip, please note that I cannot assist you if you have problems with getting the preset to show up. I'm a novice modder myself, and primarily posted this due to requests in my PM box.

[b][color=#f1c232]Recommended Mods[/color][/b]

I used the following mods in this file's screenshots:

Face Light (download v 1.8 if using with Skyrim SE): [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]

[/url]KS Hairdos 400: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?[/url]

ApachiiSkyHairMale: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?[/url]

Better Males - Younger Faces Merged WIth Men By Geonox: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?[/url]

Xenius High-Res Dirt: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29977/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29977/?[/url]

The Eyes of Beauty: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?[/url]

Beards: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?[/url]

Brows: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]

[/url]Show Race Menu Precache Killer (prevents crash when using showracemenu): [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/?
[/url]

[color=#f1c232]ENB[/color]

Most screenshots were taken using Saraan Suum ENB: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43765/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43765/?

[/url][color=#f1c232][b]Notes[/b][/color]

You can adjust the eyes/brows/beard/hair/dirt depending upon which mods you install. The preset will give you the base face structure. To get results similar to my screenshots, install the mods linked above. Visual reference: [url=http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61181-1-1421040070.jpg]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61181-1-1421040070.jpg
[/url]
author: Tair
